mcq.statement: What is the status of Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu & Kashmir as depicted on the map?

options.a: It is a province of Pakistan
options.b: It is a province of India
options.c: Final status to be decided in line with UNSC resolutions

mcq.one_liner: The map indicates that the final status of **Indian Illegally Occupied Jammu & Kashmir** is to be decided in line with relevant UNSC resolutions.
